NeatReproductionSexualSettings
public
NeatReproductionSexualSettings

Settings related to NeatReproductionSexual{T}.

Properties
SecondaryParentGeneProbability
public double SecondaryParentGeneProbability { get; set }

The probability that a gene that exists only on the secondary parent is copied into the child genome.

Functions
Validate
public void Validate()

Validate the settings, and throw an exception if not valid.

As a 'simple' collection of properties there is no construction time check that can be performed, therefore this method is supplied to allow consumers of a settings object to validate it before using it.
